page.title: 19Industry The Gravel Pit
page.content: When we had interviewed at a farm on the{DOMESDAY PROJECT}the farmer took us across a cornfield to a gravel pit.We saw a crane digging up earth and then putting it down again.On the back was a thing with caterpillar tracks which churned up the earth. They take top soil off and then move the gravel and then put back the soil again.The next year they grow crops on it.There was a notice that said _ "DO NOT DRIVE CARS ON THIS"and the earth looked like sinking sand.The road went up a hill and the hill looked as if it was made of sand.
